import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {UserService} from './user.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent { constructor(private userService:UserService){} updateDetails(){ } }
